title: Simulation/VR-Based Program for Enhancing Scientific Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Systematic training in information retrieval, analysis, evaluation, and application to enhance science-related job competencies, conducted via real-life scenario-based learning in VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze credible scientific information sources using three or more evaluation criteria (authority, source, recency, etc.).
Learners can accurately interpret scientific experiment data and visually represent results in a VR simulation environment.
Learners complete a science information utilization portfolio by conducting science information search practices twice or more weekly on the vocational training institution’s LMS system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
